Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core

Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.similarity

package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.similarity
Computation of similarity metrics for ontologies.
Remarks

Arguably, the most-used similarity measure for phenotype ontologies (by the authors) is Resnik similarity. The other set- and information content-based similarities are implemented mostly for completeness' sake. However, graph-based similarity measures (GraSM) have currently be ignored for simplicity's sake and low expected pratical usage.

References
  • Robinson, Peter N., and Sebastian Bauer. Introduction to bio-ontologies. CRC Press, 2011.
Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe
  • Class
    Description
    CosineSimilarity
    Implementation of cosine similarity.
    HpoResnikSimilarity
    Calculate pairwise similarity between HPO terms using Resnik.
    HpoResnikSimilarityPrecompute
    A static utility class for computing ICMICA values for term pairs.
    JaccardSimilarity
    Implementation of Jaccard similarity computation.
    PairwiseResnikSimilarity
    Implementation of pairwise Resnik similarity without precomputation.
    PairwiseSimilarity
    Interface for computing similarity scores between two individual terms (identified by their TermId).
    PrecomputingPairwiseResnikSimilarity
    Implementation of pairwise Resnik similarity with precomputation.
    ResnikSimilarity
    Implementation of Resnik similarity.
    Similarity
    Interface for generic similarity computation between two "objects" from the world that are each represented with one Collection of ontology TermIds.
    SimpleFeatureVectorSimilarity
    Implementation of simple feature vector similarity.
    TermOverlapSimilarity
    Implementation of term overlap similarity.
    TermPair
    Class to represent a pair of TermId objects that we will use to index Term-pair Resnik similarities.
